thread.title: Adam Rippon Is a Complicated, Outspoken, Unlikely Olympian. He’s Also Gay.

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Adam Rippon Is a Complicated, Outspoken, Unlikely Olympian. He’s Also Gay.
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—The elder statesman of the U.S. men’s figure-skating team is a 28-year-old first-time Olympian who competes in the short program to what he calls a “trashy club mix” wearing a tight mesh shirt and pretends he is a bird for his long program.
Adam Rippon is the first openly gay U.S. figure skater at the Winter Games. He made it here in part by popping back in his own dislocated shoulder—during a performance. And he recently offered this public clarification in response to questions about whether he wears... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
